あらら……翠蘭の作戦が外れちゃったせいね。: Oh, my... It's because Suiran's plan is off.
あ、あんな無茶苦茶してくる方がおかしいんですよ！\n戦場の常識ってものを知らない:
I-It'd be weirder if he went crazy like that!
Don't you know what common sense is on the battlefield?!
……いや、違う。本当は自分でも分かってる。\n私は無意識に、敵に戦術比べを期待し:
...No, that's not it. Even I know the truth.
Unconsciously, I was expecting a battle of tactics from the enemy.
防御戦闘の構えを取った後、それを敗れる攻撃戦術を取ってくると\n勝手に考えてしま:
After taking on a defensive battle stance, he said he’d use an attack tactic to defeat it
I thought about it on my own.
ＭＧ競技はスポーツやゲームみたいに、複雑なルールがある訳じゃない。\nこれは戦闘:
MG competitions don’t have complicated rules like sports or games.
This is a battle. A place where you crush what your opponent wants to do, and push your own self through.
相手の挑発に乗せられて、自分の戦術で勝つことを考えてしまった。\n気負い過ぎた私:
Taking advantage of her opponent’s provocation, she thought about winning with her own tactics.
I got too worked up and lost, huh...?
生徒会の指揮官様に一本取られてしまったわね。\nま、後はユリアたちに任せましょう:
It looks like the Student Council's commander has taken one of them.
Well, let's leave the rest to Julia and the others.
あたし達が撃墜されたところで、\nカオスメイデンの勝ちは揺らがないんだから。:
Just as we were shot down...
Chaos Maiden's victory won't waver, after all.
ユリアがいれば、戦術の差なんか腕力で捻り潰してくれます。\n勝負はここからですよ:
As long as Julia's here, she'll be able to crush any differences in tactics with her brute strength.
The match starts now, Sirius Sugaru...!
アニスさんと翠蘭さんの両名の撃墜を確認。\nどうやら戻るのが遅かったようですね。:
I confirm the shooting of both Ennis and Suiran-san.
Looks like we're late getting back.
ふふ、ふふふ……あはははは！ 面白い、本当に面白いよ！\nこんなに楽しい気持ちに:
Heheh, heheheheh... Ahahaha! Interesting, really interesting!
It's been a while since I've had this much fun!
まさか私達の隙をついてアニスちゃんと翠蘭ちゃんを\n落としちゃうなんて。:
Don't tell me you took advantage of our opening to take advantage of Ennis and Suiran-chan?
I can't believe I dropped it.
数ではこちらが不利だけど、どうする？: We're at a disadvantage in numbers. What should we do?
そんなの決まってるよ。――私が全員撃墜する！: That's obvious. I'll shoot them all down!
凄いスピードですわ。わたくしたちでは抑えきれない……ですが！\nここまで来て無策:
That's incredible speed. We can't hold it back... But!
There's no way we've come this far without a plan!
皆さん、作戦のフェーズ２に移行しますわ！\n――後は頼みましたわよ、めるさん！:
Everyone, let's move on to Operation Phase 2!
――I'll leave the rest to you, Meru-san!
任せてください！ 私が絶対に、みんなを勝利に導いてみせます！: Leave it to me! I'll definitely lead everyone to victory!
これだけは言っておくが、お前たちひとりひとりの実力は\nカオスメイデンのメンバー:
Just so you know, each and every one of you is capable
She's vastly inferior to the members of Chaos Maiden.
試合が始まる前からやる気を削ぐようなこと言うなよ……: Don't say things that'll ruin my motivation before the match even starts...
でも、事実だよねぇ。パイロットとしての技術力が違いすぎる。: But it's true, isn't it? Our technical skills as pilots are too different.
少なくとも、１対１では勝ち目がないでしょうね。: At the very least, we don't stand a chance in a one-on-one fight.
だからこそ、虚像包囲が成功した後が重要になる。: That’s why it’s important to wait until after the imaginary siege succeeds.
虚像包囲の直後、がら空きになった後衛を即座に撃破。\n数的有利を作った上で、残り:
Immediately after the imaginary encirclement, he immediately destroyed the empty rear guard.
We'll create a numerical advantage, then take out the remaining forces one by one.
……バーンズさんも各個撃破するの？: ...Are you going to destroy each and every one of them?
問題はそこだ。模擬戦を見た限りだと、\nはっきり言ってカオスメイデンのリーダーで:
That’s the problem. From what I’ve seen of the mock battle,
To put it bluntly, Yulia, the leader of Chaos Maiden, is out of control.
ユリアを自由にさせている限り、\nどれだけ数的有利を作ったところでたやすく逆転さ:
As long as I keep Julia free,
No matter how many numerical advantages we create, we'll be easily reversed.
だから、まずはユリアを封じる。\nその隙に、残りの戦力を速攻で叩くんだ。:
That’s why I’ll seal off Yulia first.
I’ll use that opportunity to strike the remaining forces quickly.
忘れたのか？ 言っただろう、めるが勝利の鍵だと。: Have you forgotten? I told you, Meguru is the key to victory.
める。お前がユリアを封じる鎖となれ。\nシリウスシュガーが勝つには、それしかない:
I will. Become the chain that seals Julia away.
That was the only way for Sirius Sugaru to win.
私がシリウスシュガーの勝利の鍵になる……！\n私が、ユリアさんを封じる鎖になる…:
I’ll be the key to Sirius Sugar’s victory...!
I'll be the chain that seals Julia away!
あはは！ もしかして私と一騎打ちするつもり？\n言っておくけど、デタラメに動いた:
Ahaha! Are you trying to fight me one-on-one?
Just so you know, there’s no point in haphazardly moving... What?
フラットスピンだけが私の武器じゃありません！\nここに至るまでに鍛え上げた技、全:
Flatspin is not my only weapon!
I'll show you all the techniques I've trained up to this point!
へぇ……フラットスピンに失速制御技術を組み合わせて\n機体の軌道を自在に変えてい:
Huh... Flatspin combined with stall control technology.
So you can freely change the trajectory of the aircraft... Not bad.
桃園める、と言ったよね。面白い、面白いよキミ！\nそのドッグファイト……相手した:
You said you'd give Momozono a try, didn't you? Interesting! You're so funny!
That dogfight... I'll take you on!!
ふふ、ふふふふ……私もユリアさんに続いて……このたぎる情熱を……！: Heheh, heheheheh... First Julia, then me... This burning passion...!
ふふふ、そうでしたね……！\n残り４機残ってたんでした！ 私達はこちらで遊びまし:
Hehehe, that's right...!
There were four machines left! Let's play here!
……与えられた役目をこなすだけ。: ...I'll just carry out the role I was given.
皆さん、数は有利ですが、油断なさらぬよう！: Everyone, we have the advantage in numbers, but do not let your guard down!
言われなくても気なんて抜かないし！ 全力で叩きつぶーす！: I won't let my guard down even if you don't tell me! I'll crush you with all my might!
